body: I just randomly type numbers, I didn't expect to see a 2 digit.code here.

Day 1- Manga 28*
Is this made by the same person as the last two or three? Art style isn't really my style but not bad. Story, still don't know how to read Japanese. Also, page 62, if that shit breaks inside her, can't it get stuck, making her need to explain what happened to a doctor? I'll give it a 5/10.
See y'all next time
